text: Toasts are now being used to display "Unlocked recipe" toasts.
Toasts now darken in all GUIs. (MC-115938)
Long advancement names are no longer cut off. (MC-116661)
"Unlocked recipe" toasts now show an icon in the top left to specify whether the unlocked recipe is a crafting or smelting recipe.
Blast Funace and Smokers no longer use crafting table icon. (MC-140953)
Stonecutters no longer use crafting table icon. (MC-142916)
toasts.png contains a new texture for the bundle tutorial.

texts.text: Toasts are text boxes shown when the player unlocks new crafting recipes or loads up a new world. They serve as a tutorial, to teach the player how to play the game. They show up in the top right corner of the screen.
